{{cpp/memory/memory_resource/title|do_allocate}}
{{cpp/memory/memory_resource/navbar}}
{{ddcl|since=c++17|1=
virtual void* do_allocate( std::size_t bytes, std::size_t alignment ) = 0;
}}

Allocates storage with a size of at least {{c|bytes}} bytes, aligned to the specified {{c|alignment}}.

{{c|alignment}} shall be a power of two.

=== Exceptions ===
Throws an exception if storage of the requested size and alignment cannot be obtained.
